title: Venpani Malare Lyrics English Meaning
stanzas:
Venpani Malare Lyrics English Meaning Translation
Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words
Venpani Malare
un vaasam uyiril pudhu
swaasam tharudhe.

un iru vizhiyaal
en aayul regai
pudhu vazhuvu perudhe.

kaalangal oaindha pinnum
kadhal enna.
vaalibam thaeindha pinnum
koochamthaan enna

[kaatril parakkum
kaathaadi naane
ettu vayathaai
kooththaadinene

kaaindha ilai naan
pachchai aanen.
paalai vanam naan
neer veelchi aanaen.](2)

Venpani Malare
un iru vizhiyaal

thaediya tharunangal ellaam
thaediye varugirathe.
dhegathin surukkagangal ellaam
sirikindrathe

vandhathum vazhndhadhum
kanmunne therigirathe.
andha naal niyabagam
nenjile pookkiradhe.

baaram paaindha
nenjukulle
eeram paayudhe.
naraigalum marindhidave

Venpani Malare
un iru vizhiyaal

Venpani Malare
un vaasam uyiril pudhu
swaasam tharudhe.

un iru vizhiyaal
en aayul regai
pudhu vazhuvu perudhe.

kaalangal oaindha pinnum
kadhal enna.
vaalibam thaeindha pinnum
koochamthaan enna

[kaatril parakkum
kaathaadi naane
ettu vayathaai
kooththaadinene

kaaindha ilai naan
pachchai aanen.
paalai vanam naan
neer veelchi aanaen.](2)		 English Translation
I tried my best :)
Hey snow flower,
Your scent gives
new breath in my soul.

With your eyes,
My lifetime has
Got new life.

A love story,
even at this age.
No shyness
After wasting adolescence

I am a kite
flying in the air.
I was a jerk
till age of eight.

I was a dried leaf
changed now to green.
I was a desert
changed now to a waterfall.

Hey snow flower..
With your eyes…

All the searched moments
are coming back to me.
All the wrinkles are
smiling at me.

Could see my life
before my eyes.
Old Time memories
Blooms in the heart.

Heart filled with burden
now became lighter
and wet…
Grey hairs are vanishing..

Hey snow flower..
With your eyes…

Hey snow flower,
Your scent gives
new breath in my soul.

With your eyes,
My lifetime has
Got new life.

A love story,
even at this age.
No shyness
After wasting adolescence

I am a kite
flying in the air.
I was a jerk
till age of eight.

I was a dried leaf
changed now to green.
I was a desert
changed now to a waterfall.
